this torrent has all CDs and a crack to it for Flight Simulator
what you need
1. Demon Tools light 
2. How to explore a CD

Step one press download torrent
step two wait for it to finish
step three seed it
step four open up demon tools light and you will see a image at the bottom right of a lighting bolt right click on it then go to Virtual CD/DVD-ROM and then you will see a Device then go there and then click mount image (then mount the Flight Simulator ISO from my torrent)
Step five now in my computer you should see a new drive that says Flight Simulator cd right click on it and then press explore
Step six now in there is a folder called crack open it and you will have a Key and another file
step seven once you have finished installing Filght Simulator go back into the folder in step six and put the FS9 file in to your C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Flight Simulator 9 and replace the file
Step eight then install Flight Simulator and HAVE FUN!!!
